articles.title: Israel and Iran agree to ceasefire to bring end to '12 DAY WAR,' Trump says - ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos

articles.summary: Israel and Iran agree to ceasefire to bring end to '12 DAY WAR,' Trump says The agreement involves two 12-hour ceasefire periods, starting with Iran. Trump announces ceasefire between Israel and IranPresident Donald Trump announced on social media that Israel and Iran have agreed to a complete and total ceasefire, set to begin in approximately 6 hours. articles.summary: Last Update June 23, 2025, 10:18 PM EDT Iranian missiles fired at Al-Udeid US base, intercepted over Qatar Iran launched at least six missiles toward America's Al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar on Monday, retaliating for President Donald Trump's attack on Tehran's nuclear program this weekend. articles.title: Exclusive: Iranian retaliation against US attack ‘most probably’ hours away - Amwaj.media
articles.summary: Inside story: 'Conclusion' to Iran-Israel war expected after Iranian retaliation for US bombings Iran and Israel appear set to end their 12-day war, informed Iranian sources have told Amwaj. media. Israel is expected to stop its attacks on Iran at 3. 30 am Jerusalem time on June 24, with the anticipation that Iran will shortly follow suit in ceasing offensive...
